Easy Standing Forward Bend.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Bend knees slightly. Hinge at hips and fold forward. Let arms hang or rest hands on shins. Keep back relaxed.

Half Forward Fold.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Hinge at hips and fold forward halfway, keeping back straight. Place hands on shins or thighs. Keep knees soft.

Standing Side Bend.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Raise one arm overhead. Lean to the side, reaching arm toward ceiling. Keep hips level. Switch sides.

Tree Pose.instructions: Stand on one leg, place the other foot on the inner thigh of the standing leg. Bring hands to prayer position at chest. Balance and breathe steadily.

Downward Dog.instructions: Start on hands and knees. Lift hips up and back, straightening legs. Form an inverted V shape. Press heels toward floor. Keep arms straight and head between arms.

Bridge Pose.instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet flat on floor. Lift hips toward ceiling. Keep shoulders and head on floor. Clasp hands under back if comfortable.

Easy Pose.instructions: Sit cross-legged on floor. Rest hands on knees. Keep spine straight. Breathe deeply and relax.

Staff Pose.instructions: Sit on the floor with legs extended straight in front. Place hands beside hips, fingers pointing forward. Keep spine straight and shoulders relaxed. Engage thigh muscles.

Butterfly Pose.instructions: Sit with soles of feet together. Let knees fall open. Hold feet with hands. Gently flap knees like butterfly wings.

Camel Pose.instructions: Kneel with knees hip-width apart. Place hands on lower back. Arch back and reach hands toward heels. Keep hips forward and thighs vertical.

Cobra Pose.instructions: Lie face down with hands under shoulders. Press into hands to lift chest off ground. Keep elbows close to body and hips on floor.

Plank Pose.instructions: Start in push-up position with hands under shoulders. Keep body in straight line from head to heels. Engage core and hold.

Hero Pose.instructions: Kneel with knees together. Sit back between heels. Keep spine straight and hands on thighs. Relax shoulders.

Chair Pose.instructions: Stand with feet together. Bend knees as if sitting back into chair. Raise arms overhead. Keep weight in heels.

Mountain Pose.instructions: Stand tall with feet together or hip-width apart. Arms at sides. Distribute weight evenly. Keep spine straight and shoulders relaxed.

Child Pose.instructions: Kneel on floor with knees wide. Fold forward, extending arms in front. Rest forehead on floor. Breathe deeply.

Seated Forward Bend.instructions: Sit with legs extended straight. Hinge at hips and fold forward. Reach toward feet. Keep back relaxed.

Cat Pose.instructions: Start on hands and knees. Arch back upward like a cat. Tuck chin to chest. Engage core.

Cow Pose.instructions: Start on hands and knees. Arch back downward, lifting chest and gaze. Relax shoulders.
